meanings.definition: Machinery that uses a turbine to generate power.
meanings.sent1: The turbomachinery in the factory helps produce electricity.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in manufacturing turbomachinery for power plants.
meanings.sent3: The turbomachinery at the amusement park made the roller coaster go super fast!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like turbomachinery, driving the project forward with great force.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the turbomachinery echoed through the building, signaling its efficiency.

meanings.definition: The study or design of machines that use turbines.
meanings.sent1: Learning about turbomachinery involves understanding how turbines work.
meanings.sent2: Engineers focus on turbomachinery to improve energy efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The class on turbomachinery was so interesting, it felt like a breeze!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a whirlwind of ideas, spinning like turbomachinery in motion.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained turbomachinery with clear diagrams and examples.

meanings.definition: The industry or field related to the production and use of turbine-powered machinery.
meanings.sent1: Working in turbomachinery requires knowledge of turbine technology.
meanings.sent2: The conference discussed the latest advancements in turbomachinery.
meanings.sent3: The turbomachinery expo was a whirlwind of new products and innovations.
meanings.sent4: Her career took off like a jet thanks to her expertise in turbomachinery.
meanings.sent5: The company invested heavily in turbomachinery to stay competitive in the market.
